title: Why Trust Whiteboard Consultants For Your German Education?
description: As the leading study in Germany consultants in Kolkata, we provide specialized guidance for navigating the German university system, including public universities with no tuition fees.

features.text: Expert guidance on the APS certification process.
High success rate for German student visa applications, including Blocked Account setup.
Specialized advice for engineering, IT, and business programs in Germany.
Assistance with finding and applying to English-taught programs.
Support for understanding the Studienkolleg (preparatory course) requirement.
End-to-end support from application to pre-departure.

image.alt: A team of education consultants collaborating on study in Germany applications
